title: Brighten My Day With A Carolina Brights
author: The Nasty Nati

posts.post_title: Brighten My Day With A Carolina Brights
posts.post_content:
Looking for a Carolina Brights back to finish my mini back run (all brands minus the top 4). Looking for one in Poor to Fair condition. I don't mind creases or paper loss as long as the back is somewhat presentable.

Thanks!
